effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target's stat modifiers, including evasion.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
Looking for an opening, the user strikes
continually. The target’s stat changes
don’t affect this attack’s damage.
